description: Avoid with this module that the game is reloaded when you press certain buttons.
name: Asynchronous buttons

buildingTax.description: Prevents recharging when you set the cost of own cells or hospital beds.
buildingTax.title: Cost absorption of cells and beds

deleteARR.description: Prevents reloading when you delete an ARR entry
deleteARR.title: Delete ARR entries

deleteForumPost.description: Prevents reloading when you delete a forum post.
deleteForumPost.title: Delete Forum Posts

memberlistManageUser.description: Prevents reloading, if you have Alliance member throw out or edit his rights
memberlistManageUser.title: Rights of members of the Alliance
